--- title: dlsproc keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Download Spanish procurement" description: "Download Spanish procurement" nb_path: "index.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

One is better off checking the wiki, but this is Python code meant to download Spanish government's Plataforma de contratación del sector público metadata (right now, it does not download any document).

Install

pip install dlsproc

How to use

The software can be exploited as a library or as standalone scripts.

{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

For testing purposes one can download, e.g., Outsiders contracts for 2018 and then

dlsproc_extend_parquet_with_zip.pyextends an existing parquet file with data extracted from a given zip file.
